Plot: A viceroy and an archbishop take their posts in Mexico. A local nun, Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz (1651-1695), intrigues them. The viceroy and his wife find her brilliant and fascinating. The ...
Title: I, the Worst of All
Writer: María Luisa Bemberg, Antonio Larreta, Octavio Paz (novel)
Actors: Assumpta Serna, Dominique Sanda, Héctor Alterio, Lautaro Murúa
